events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund immediately as this was not what I paid for.
The issue was identified as a refund request due to a wrong item being delivered to the customer.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah to handle the refund process for the incorrect item delivery.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you want a refund for the wrong item you received. Let me help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Sure, the order number is 987654321. I have attached a clear photo of the wrong item that was sent instead of the jacket I ordered.
Thank you for the details. I will process a full refund to your original payment method and arrange a prepaid label for you to return the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and the refund offer. I appreciate the prepaid label for the return as well.
Your refund has been successfully initiated and you will receive the return shipping label by email within the next hour.
We wanted to check if you received the refund and the return label and if everything is now satisfactory with your order experience.
Since the refund was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
